general_advisory: Sow wheat and barley early to avoid heat stress. Ensure proper ventilation for chicken.

advisory: Plant wheat in well-drained soil. Apply nitrogen fertilizer for better growth.
Barley requires cool temperatures. Irrigate regularly to prevent water stress.
Maize needs full sun and well-drained soil. Watch out for common pests like corn earworm.
Provide fresh water and balanced feed to chickens. Keep the coop clean and well-ventilated.
